param.name: country
param.label: Donor's Default Country
param.description: You can change the default checkout language and content for your donor by selecting from the countries below. Otherwise, do nothing and your donors can choose for themselves.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
